pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, March 15, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, March 15, 2017:

New York City, United States of America

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception “An Evening at Come from Away.”

Closed to media.

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the musical Come from Away, and will deliver brief remarks.

Gerald Schoenfeld Theatre
New York, New York

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage of the remarks only
